Translations.Text: Ani tyacya (nuhacya) mage yenaryampaikica ibrahimahi hote
Jevha te apalya palanakartyajavala sud'dha (nirdosa) antahkaranasaha ale
Te apalya pityasa ani apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale ki tumhi kasaci bhakti aradhana karita ahata
Kaya tumhi allahakherija manane racaleli upasye icchita
Tara maga (sanga ki) tumhi sarva visvancya palanakartyala kaya samajuna ghetale ahe
Ata (ibrahimane) eka najara taryanvara takali
Ani mhanale ki mi tara ajari ahe
Yavara sarvajana tyacyapasuna tonda phiravita parata calale gele
Te (ibrahima) haluca tyancya upasyam (devatam) javala gele ani mhanale, tumhi khata ka nahita
Tumhala jhalam tari kaya ki tumhi bolata sud'dha nahita
Maga tara (purna saktine) ujavya hatane tyanna maranyasa tutuna padale
Te (anekesvaravadi) dhavata palata tyancyakade ale
Tevha te (ibrahima) mhanale ki tumhi asanci puja karata, jyanna tumhi svatah banavita
Vastavika tumhala ani tumhi banavilelya vastunna allahaneca nirmana kele ahe
Te (loka) mhanale, yacyasathi eka ghara (agnikunda) tayara kara ani tya (dhagadhagatya) agita yala takuna dya
Tyanni tara tyacya (ibrahima) si dava kheli icchile, parantu amhi tyannaca tondaghasi padale
Ani (ibrahima) mhanale ki mi tara (hijarata- desatyaga) karuna apalya palanartyakade janara ahe, to niscitaca mala marga dakhavila
He majhya palanakartya! Mala neka sadacari putra pradana kara
Tevha amhi tyala eka sahanasila putra (prapti) ci subhavarta dili

Maga tevha (balaka) ya vayasa pohacale ki tyacyasobata hindu phiru sakela, tevha (ibrahima) mhanale, he majhya priya putra! Mi svapnata svatahla tujhe balidana (kurbani) karatana pahata ahe. Ata tuca sanga, tujha kaya vicara ahe?1 Putrane uttara dile, he pita! Jo adesa (allahatarphe) dila jata ahe, tyace palana kara. Allahane icchile tara mi tumhala dhira-sanyama rakhanaryampaiki adhalela
Arthata jevha doghanni svikara kela ani tya (pitya) ne tya (putra) la matha tekalelya avastheta khali padale
Tevha amhi haka marali, he ibrahima
Nihsansaya, tumhi svapnala khare karuna dakhavile. Nihsansaya, amhi bhala'i karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Vastavika hi ughada asi kasoti hoti
Ani amhi eka motha jabiha (bali), tyacya phidiya (muktidhana) svarupata dila
Ani amhi tyanci subha carca nantaracya lokammadhye baki thevali
Ibrahimavara salama aso
Amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Niscitaca to amacya imana balaganarya dasampaiki hota
Ani amhi tyala paigambara isahakaca subha samacara dila, jo neka sadacari lokampaiki asela
Ani amhi ibrahima va isahakavara aneka (prakaraci) samrd'dhi avatarita keli ani ya doghancya santatita kahi tara bhagyasali aheta ani kahi apalya prananvara ughada atyacara karatata
Ani niscitaca amhi musa ani harunavara motha upakara kela
Ani tyanci ani tyancya janasamuhaci phara mothya duhkha-yatanetuna sutaka keli
Ani tyanci madata keli, tevha teca varcasvasali (vijayi) rahile
Ani amhi tyanna (spasta ani) divya grantha pradana kela
Ani tya doghanna sarala margavara sthira (baki) thevale
Ani amhi tya doghankarita nantara yenaryammadhye hi gosta baki thevali
Musa ani harunavara salama asoe
Nihsansaya, amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karita asato
Nihsansaya, he doghe amacya imanadharaka dasampaiki hote
Ani nihsansaya, iliyasa dekhila paigambarampaiki hote
Jevha te apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale, tumhi allahace bhaya nahi balagata
Kaya tumhi (va'a‌la) navacya murtila pukarata ani sarvanta uttama asa nirmanakartyala soduna deta
Allaha, jo tumaca ani tumacyapurvi ho'una gelelya sarva vadavadilanca svami va palanakarta ahe
Parantu janasamuhacya lokanni tyanna khote tharavile, tevha te avasya (siksa - yatanagrasta avastheta) hajara kele jatila
Matra allahacya sacca pramanika dasankherija
Ani amhi (iliyasaci) subha carca nantaracya lokammadhye baki thevali
Iliyasavara salama aso
Amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Nihsansaya, to amacya imanadharaka dasampaiki hota
Nihsansaya, luta (alai.) Paigambarampaiki hote
Amhi tyanna ani tyancya kutumbiyanna, sarvanna mukti pradana keli
Matra tya mhatarikherija, ji mage rahanaryammadhye rahili
Maga amhi itara sarvanca sarvanasa kela
Ani tumhi tara sakala jhalyavara tyancya vastyanvaruna jata
Ani ratri dekhila, maga kaya tarihi samajuna gheta nahi
Ani nihsansaya, yunusa dekhila paigambarampaiki hote
Jevha te paluna ja'una bharelalya naukejavala pohocale
Maga (phasa takuna) nava kadhale gele, tevha he parabhuta jhale
Maga tyanna masane giluna takale ani te svatahcaca dhihkkara karu lagale
Tevha jara te tasbiha (allahace gunagana) karanaryampaiki nasate
Tara lokanna uthavile janyacya divasaparyanta masacya potataca rahile asate
